name: destructionist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who believes in destroying things, especially existing social, political, or economic structures: Destructionists are using various means to destroy constructive projects, and to cause unrest and instability. "Anarchist" is a term which is frequently wrongly applied to mere violent destructionists.
More examplesFewer examplesHe could be described as a creative destructionist, bringing renewal through obliteration.We believe there is a small handful of dangerous destructionists who want to reverse the progress we have made in this city.The religious destructionists are trying to uproot and destroy indigenous patterns of culture.
